info.title: Kapsalon Vilani API
info.description: API for managing a hair salon's services, products, and appointments

get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

post.description: Creates a new category. Only the name field is mandatory, active is optional.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid or missing fields

get.summary: Get a specific category by ID

put.description: Updates an existing category. name is required.

name: The name field must be unique

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

get.summary: Get all categories for a product

put.summary: Sync categories for a product (replace all existing with the provided set)

requestBody.description: Add and remove categories. Send an array of category ids to add and/or change the current categories, send an empty array to remove all.

categories.description: Array of category IDs. Send an empty array [] to remove all categories.

404.description: Product not found or category not found

422.description: Validation error - Missing or invalid fields

get.summary: Get all products with their associated categories

200.description: List of products with their categories

get.summary: Get all categories that are associated with any products

200.description: List of category names used by products

post.description: Creates a new product and returns the product details

requestBody.description: Required fields: name, description, price, stock. Optional field: image

stock.description: Required. Number of items in stock

image.description: Optional. Image filename for the product

put.description: Updates a product and returns the updated product details

delete.description: Marks a product as inactive (soft delete) instead of removing it from the database

get.description: Returns list of all active services

post.description: Creates a new service and returns the service details

requestBody.description: Required fields: name, description, duration_phase_1. Optional fields: rest_duration, duration_phase_2

duration_phase_1.description: Required. Duration of phase 1 in minutes

duration_phase_2.description: Optional. Duration of phase 2 in minutes

get.description: Returns list of all services regardless of active status

put.description: Updates a service and returns the updated service details

delete.description: Deletes a service by changing active to 0

get.summary: Get all categories for a service
get.description: Get all categories for a service

get.summary: Get all services with their associated categories

200.description: List of services with their categories

get.summary: Get all categories that are associated with any services

200.description: List of category names used by services

requestBody.description: Add and remove categories. Send an array of category ids to add and/or change the current categories, send an empty array to remove all.

categories.description: Array of category IDs. Send an empty array [] to remove all categories.

404.description: Service not found or category not found

422.description: Validation error - Missing or invalid fields

active.description: Category status: 1 for active, 0 for inactive/deleted (optional, default: 1)
